Question answers: Please complete and submit a TReNDS Payment Request form to ops@trendscenter.org. The Payment Request Form is in the https://sites.google.com/gsu.edu/trends-center-intranet/purchasing-and-travel  Purchasing and Travel section of TReNDS Intranet with instructions included in the download. All payment requests should be made within 30 days of the receipt being submitted for reimbursements. It is important to make sure you submit your request by downloading the most recent version of the form available on the TReNDS Intranet to assure the use of accurate account information.

Question answers: Please submit any HR concerns to the following email: hr@trendscenter.org. Question answers: You must use your GSU email and password when you are logging into any of our TReNDS Google accounts. TReNDS does not have access to G-Mail, which can make logging in challenging. We recommend logging in here: https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/my-drive  first with your GSU credentials and then trying to navigate to the intranet

Question answers:
Step 1: Use your GSU CampusID and Password to login to https://sfi.gsu.edu         
Step 2: Under the My Disclosure tab scroll down to the Annual Disclosure section. Please note that if you are an employee in the TReNDS Department, your division is URSA and your Department is TReNDS. Please do not indicate Psychology as your department. Contact hr@trendscenter.org if you have questions regarding your department.
Step 3: Select Yes for Annual Disclosure and answer the corresponding questions that appear. 
Step 4: Select the Save Annual Disclosure button at the bottom of this section to save your responses.
Step 5: Make any other changes to your disclosure form that are needed.         
Step 6: Also click the Update button at the bottom of the form to save all changes and submit your disclosure.  
Please use the following How-To Guide for additional guidance: How to Complete an Annual Disclosure.
Model Questions:
I need to complete the SFI disclosure form. Where is it located?
I need to complete the Significant Financial Interests disclosure form. Where is it located?

Question answers: All TReNDS non-faculty employees are in the TReNDS department under the division of URSA (University Research Services & Administration). TReNDS faculty employees are in the department of Computer Science which is under COAS. TReNDS is not part of Psychology or College of Arts and Sciences (COAS). Contact hr@trendscenter.org if you have questions regarding your department.
Model Questions:
What is my department?
Are we in the Psychology department?
Are we part of the College of Arts and Sciences (COAS)?

Question answers: You may access daily snapshots of backups of your home directory in `~/.snapshots` (To view the content of this directory with the dates and other useful information `ls -lha ~/.snapshot`). Pick the snapshot you want to restore from and copy the data from `~/.snapthots/*/thefile` to the place in your home directory you have deleted it from.

Question answers:
Process for the Traveler:
Travelers should complete the Travel Authorization that indicates their GSU affiliation (Employee, Student, or Non - Employee). The traveler should refer to https://services.gsu.edu/travel/  and select Travel Inc. Website for guidance with the GSU travel process. Initiation of travel requests should start one to two months prior to the date of travel. Later requests may not be eligible for certain options, like advance payments from the University. Employees should not travel without submitting a Travel Authorization Form prior to their trip. Submit your completed Travel Authorization to ops@trendscenter.org for processing.
Model Questions:
What is the International Travel Authorization Process? Where is the travel authorization form?
Requirements on International Travel

What are the travel documents to submit for reimbursement?
